Description: Whitelisting domains in transport rules bypasses regular malware and phishing scanning, which can enable an attacker to launch attacks against your users from a safe haven domain.
Remediation: 1. Connect-ExchangeOnline > 2. Remove-TransportRule {RuleName} > 3. Get-TransportRule | Where-Object {($_.setscl -eq -1 -and $_.SenderDomainIs -ne $null)} | ft Name,SenderDomainIs

References.Text: 9.7 Deploy and Maintain Email Server Anti-Malware Protections
